column1:
Log Out
Logged in as:
Please enter your name (First and Last)
<form name="blah" id="blah2" onsubmit='Login("../login_pass.cgi", "blah2"); return false;' ENCTYPE="multipart/form-data">

Change Password
Enter new password:
Repeat new password:

• NOTE: Your database password is separate to your windows logon. You will need to set a database password as well.
  • Please choose a secure password.

• By logging in with a username and password, you agree to take responsibility for all actions recorded against your login.
  • As such, please take care to secure any terminal that you have logged in to, locking the terminal when away from it (Ctrl-Alt-Del, Lock this Computer).
  • Your screensaver can be set to lock the computer after a timeout. Please see Sam if you need help with this.
  • When logging into a shared computer, please remember to log out before leaving the computer.
